SEARCH
Package com.example.seaSideEscape.service

Class EventBookingService

java.lang.Object
com.example.seaSideEscape.service.EventBookingService
@Service public class EventBookingService extends Object
Service class for managing event bookings and venue availability in the SeaSide Escape application. Provides functionality to book events, retrieve event bookings, and check venue availability.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventBookingService

      @Autowired public EventBookingService(VenueRepository venueRepository, EventBookingRepository eventBookingRepository)
      Constructs a new EventBookingService.
      Parameters:
      venueRepository - the repository for managing venue entities
      eventBookingRepository - the repository for managing event bookings

  • Method Details

    • bookEvent

      public EventBooking bookEvent(Long venueID, LocalDateTime eventDate, String eventName, String guestEmail)
      Books an event at a specified venue on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      venueID - the ID of the venue to book
      eventDate - the date and time of the event
      eventName - the name of the event
      guestEmail - the email address of the guest booking the event
      Returns:
      the EventBooking object representing the booked event
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the venue does not exist, is already booked, or if the event date, name, or guest email are invalid

    • getEventBooking

      public EventBooking getEventBooking(Long id)
      Retrieves an event booking by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the event booking
      Returns:
      the EventBooking object representing the booking
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no booking is found with the specified ID

    • getAvailableVenuesByFloor

      public List<Venue> getAvailableVenuesByFloor(int floorNumber)
      Retrieves a list of available venues on a specific floor. A venue is considered available if it is not booked.
      Parameters:
      floorNumber - the floor number to filter available venues
      Returns:
      a list of available venues on the specified floor
